TopicTitle: Bill Kerman teleported to the Mun

Articles.Content:
I landed on the mun and took all three kerbals outside, went back to the kerbal space center while I went to something. I came back, went to the tracking station, selected my lander and pressed control. Then when I started loading my kerbals into the lander,  I couldnt get Enger Kerman into the command pod. In the imgur link you can see Bill, Doodul and Henbal Kerman sitting in the command pod, with Enger Kerman standing on the outside. This lander only has the command pod for kerbals. It has 3 seats. There are 4 kerbals on the mun. And since I didnt take bill kerman on the mission, he somehow teleported from Kerbin, to the mun and into the command pod of my lander. https://imgur.com/gallery/gGuStY6

game version 0.1.2.0.22258

Running on Windows 11

PC Specs:

GPU: RTX3060ti

CPU: i5-11400

SSD:  Samsung 870 EVO 2TB

Edited April 13, 2023 by Panstrovski

Also when I then came back with a second rocket to rescue enger, the first lander dissapeared underground. I then tried reloading from the tracking station to my second lander and the command module just disconnected.
